statements: SELECT * FROM volunteer_schedule WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM volunteer_schedule WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT schedule_id, volunteer_id, schedule_date FROM volunteer_schedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT volunteer_id, task_id, start_time FROM volunteer_schedule WHERE end_time <= '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM volunteer_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_schedule WHERE volunteer_id = 1 ORDER BY schedule_date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT volunteer_id, task_id, schedule_date FROM volunteer_schedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT volunteer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tasks FROM volunteer_schedule GROUP BY volunteer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY total_tasks DESC;
SELECT volunteer_id, task_id, TIME_FORMAT(start_time, '%H:%i') AS start, TIME_FORMAT(end_time, '%H:%i') AS end FROM volunteer_schedule WHERE task_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT DISTINCT volunteer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT task_id) AS total_unique_tasks FROM volunteer_schedule GROUP BY volunteer_id ORDER BY total_unique_tasks DESC;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM Volunteers ORDER BY volunteer_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_location FROM Tasks WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_location FROM Tasks WHERE task_location LIKE '%Central%';
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_phone FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id > 2 ORDER BY volunteer_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_location, volunteer_name FROM Tasks JOIN Volunteers ON Tasks.volunteer_id = Volunteers.volunteer_id;
SELECT task_name, task_location FROM Tasks WHERE task_location LIKE '%City%' AND task_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY task_name;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_phone FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY volunteer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_schedule LIMIT 10;
SELECT volunteer_id, date, shift_start FROM volunteer_schedule WHERE date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM task_assignment WHERE volunteer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM deployment_map WHERE location = 'Building A' ORDER BY assigned_date DESC;
SELECT deployment_id, location, assigned_volunteer FROM deployment_map WHERE task_id = '8ab0fc68-44cf-4857-b9e1-22ecf9b3b1d9';
SELECT * FROM volunteer_schedule WHERE volunteer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT task_description, assigned_date FROM task_assignment ORDER BY assigned_date DESC
SELECT location, task_id FROM deployment_map WHERE location = 'Hospital' AND task_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT volunteer_id, sum(shift_end - shift_start) AS total_shift_duration FROM volunteer_schedule GROUP BY volunteer_id
SELECT * FROM deployment_map INNER JOIN task_assignment ON deployment_map.task_id = task_assignment.task_id
SELECT * FROM Volunteer;
SELECT volunteer_id, name, address FROM Volunteer WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT task_name, priority FROM Task ORDER BY priority DESC;
SELECT deployment_id, location, status FROM Deployment WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT volunteer_id, task_id, date, start_time FROM Schedule WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Volunteer;
SELECT volunteer_id, name, contact_number FROM Volunteer WHERE availability = true;
SELECT Task.task_name, Deployment.location, Schedule.date FROM Task JOIN Schedule ON Task.task_id = Schedule.task_id JOIN Deployment ON Schedule.schedule_id = Deployment.schedule_id;

SELECT Volunteer.name, Task.task_name, Schedule.date, Deployment.location FROM Volunteer JOIN Schedule ON Volunteer.volunteer_id = Schedule.volunteer_id JOIN Deployment ON Schedule.schedule_id = Deployment.schedule_id JOIN Task ON Task.task_id = Schedule.task_id WHERE Volunteer.availability = true;

SELECT Volunteer.name, Schedule.date, Schedule.start_time, Schedule.end_time, Deployment.location, Deployment.status FROM Volunteer JOIN Schedule ON Volunteer.volunteer_id = Schedule.volunteer_id JOIN Deployment ON Schedule.schedule_id = Deployment.schedule_id WHERE Deployment.status = 'ongoing';
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT name, email FROM volunteers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks ORDER BY task_date DESC;
SELECT l.location_name, l.address, l.city, l.state, a.assignment_date FROM assignments a JOIN locations l ON a.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT v.name, t.task_name, l.city FROM assignments a JOIN volunteers v ON a.volunteer_id = v.id JOIN tasks t ON a.task_id = t.task_id JOIN locations l ON a.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT * FROM volunteers JOIN assignments ON volunteers.id = assignments.volunteer_id
SELECT tasks.task_name, tasks.task_description, schedules.schedule_date FROM tasks JOIN schedules ON tasks.task_id = schedules.task_id
SELECT volunteers.name, volunteers.email, assignments.assignment_date FROM volunteers JOIN assignments ON volunteers.id = assignments.volunteer_id
SELECT DISTINCT locations.location_name, locations.city, assignments.assignment_date FROM locations JOIN assignments ON locations.location_id = assignments.location_id

SELECT tasks.task_name, volunteers.name, locations.address FROM tasks JOIN assignments ON tasks.task_id = assignments.task_id JOIN volunteers ON volunteers.id = assignments.volunteer_id JOIN locations ON locations.location_id = assignments.location_id
